original_text: The angel said to Joseph, ‘Get up. The people who wanted to kill the child are dead. Take the child and his mother. You can now return with them to Israel.’
korean_text: 일어나 아기와 그의 어머니를 데리고 이스라엘 땅으로 가라 아기의 목숨을 찾던 자들이 죽었느니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: The people who wanted to kill the child are dead
Take the child and his mother
You can now return with them to Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들을 데리고 이스라엘로 돌아갈 수 있다
